text: nam'mute drstantannal ninnalkk otikelpicc tarikayum, ninnale sanskarikkukayum, ninnalkk vedavum vijnanavum pathippiccutarikayum, ninnalkk arivillattat ninnalkk ariyiccutarikayum ceyyunna, ninnalute kuttattil ninnu tanneyulla oru dutane ninnalilekk nam niyeagiccat (vali ninnalkk ceyta anugraham) pealettanneyakunnu itum
